reg_pit.title: Okanagan-Kootenay Sterile Insect Release Service Regulation

change.changenote: Section 1 definition of "converted value of land" BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 122/2022, effective May 24, 2022.

bcl:definition.bcl:text: converted value of land means the net taxable value of land for regional hospital district purposes multiplied by the percentage prescribed for that land for the purposes of section 808 (1) of the Municipal Act;

change.changenote: Section 1 definitions of "converted value of land and improvements" and "planted acreage" were added by BC Reg 122/2022, effective May 24, 2022.
Section 4 (2) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 122/2022, effective May 24, 2022.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The annual costs of a sterile insect release service that are not recovered by a parcel tax under section 2 shall be apportioned among the participating regional districts on the basis of the converted value of land in the participating areas for the service that are within each regional district.
